item.title: Things to consider when choosing nodes for your Kubernetes cluster
item.description: Regardless of whether you’re architecting new services or preparing to migrate your workloads – choosing the proper underlying nodes size can make or break your experience with this amazing tool. Here are some key points you should pay attention to.
